column2: an A.M. Eatery////Well worth the wait
column3: the food is definitely one of a kind. I order the spud deluxe with onions and barbacoa
column4: it was fantastic. The porridge is a must
column5: the texture alone will put you on a different level. The cinnamon pancake was my favorite out of all the pancakes.(off the menu item) The snooze pot pie was awesome as well
column6: just melts in your mouth. I wish I could try the whole menu in one sitting. Atmosphere is layed back fits in perfect in the montrose area.
